original_text: Again he sent to them another servant, and they struck him on the head and treated him shamefully.
korean_text: 다시 다른 종을 보내니 그의 머리에 상처를 내고 능욕하였거늘

sentences.original_text: Again he sent to them another servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 또 다른 종을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: and they struck him on the head
